About Me

Your time matters to me, here's a little of what I'm about...

BIO

I'm a highly motivated student presently working on my Associate of Science to transfer into an undergraduate degree in Physics. I have a huge passion for science and technology. I've earned an Associate of General Studies, and an Electronics Certificate. I learned how to solder circuits together and got introduced to research writing, digital electronics, microprocessor systems and robotics. I love learning about programming, electronics, and new technologies.

Below are some of my most recent jobs...

Edmonds Community College

MESA Student Program Assistant

Oct 2018 – June 2019

Employment Duration: current

Location: Lynnwood, Washington

Researching and promoting STEM related internships to assist MESA students. Duties include but are not limited to, data entry, meeting with stakeholders, assisting MESA Director with various tasks as needed.

Fieldwork Inc.

Phone Room Recruiter

Oct 2016 – Jun 2017

Employment Duration: 9 mos

Location: Kirkland, Washington

Recruiting participants by calling, screening, and scheduling respondents who signed up to participate in focus groups and research studies for a nationally renowned facility of a leading market research company.

University of Washington - Bothell Campus

Community Assessment Intern

May 2016 – Nov 2016

Employment Duration: 7 mos

Location Bothell, Washington

Supported efforts to help the University of Washington be more welcoming and supportive to Latino students, was instructed on how to conduct interviews, literature reviews, and further develop research skills.

Seattle Coffee Gear

Retail Sales Associate

Aug 2015 – Jan 2016

Employment Duration: 6 mos

Location Lynnwood, Washington

Provided excellent customer service in store and over the phone by learning the ins and outs of products and sharing knowledge with customers, answering questions and assisting customers in selecting equipment. Also assisted with stocking, inventory, product display, maintaining and organizing the store for a unique and innovative leading home coffee equipment company.
